entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Activator.CreateInstance<T> does not bring compile error or throw exception for required property #102734
  • Assertion failed 'IS_ALIGNED(addr, byteSize)' #102732
  • sslStream.NegotiatedApplicationProtocol is empty after TLS1.3 renegotiation on Windows #102731
  • Raise the AppDomain.UnhandledException event from Objective-C bridge #102730
  • Mac Catalyst (arm64): Attempting to JIT compile method '...' while running in aot-only mode. #102728
  • DispatchProxy throws TypeLoadException for static virtual members #102716
  • ILC: Assertion failed '(unsigned)reg < ArrLen(regMasks)' in '...' during 'Generate code' (IL size 6; hash 0x04901a61; FullOpts) #102715
  • [Android] Runtime sample app and test crash with OpenJDK 21 #102714
  • Unhandled exception. System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: No such host is known. (https:80) #102710
  • [MSVC][permissive] Resolving C4146 Error in MSVC Compilation with /permissive Flag #102708
  • Test failure: GC\\Features\\HeapExpansion\\Finalizer\\Finalizer.cmd #102706

Closed

  • Add NetBSD version of CLI #5123
  • Comparing test results #5467
  • Linux/ARM: location of binary packages for arm/arm64 #5488
  • Use -stable, -unstable, and -yolo for package pre-release versions across NuGet, MyGet, and CI feeds. #5858
  • Build verbose generates very long command line #5490
  • Possible to license or use a version of clrdbg outside vscode or visual studio? #7052
  • How to profile the ni.dll from crossgen? #7502
  • GCStress is not safe when not using per-thread allocation contexts #7670
  • [SOS] Intermittent Connection Issues with HttpClient in .NET 6 #101407
  • run-xunit-perf should handle multiple scenarios in one test #7930
  • ilasm produces wrong SequencePoints when a method references several Documents #102198
  • Http2Connection throws misleading exceptions on ping timeouts #102623
    9.0.0
  • [7.0] Globalization IcuAppLocalTests .TestIcuAppLocal test failure #88742
    7.0.x
  • System.Management.Tests fails with "CONTRACT VIOLATION by LoaderAllocator::SetHandleValue" #102719
  • [API Proposal]: Add CallerType attribute to tell the method the current type that is invoking the current member. #102725
  • [API Proposal]: AsyncContext for cancellation and ConfigureAwait #102111
  • NativeAOT can report wrong sizes of native structs #75666
    Future
  • Overriding global serialization options with `JsonConverterAttribute` behaves unexpectedly #102712
  • String.ToUpper with Turkish CultureInfo doesn't work on Android #102622
  • [tvos-arm64] System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.XsdDataContractExporterTests.ExporterTypesTests.TypesTest failed #101549
    9.0.0
  • Fix Task Library Async Causality Stack Reconstruction #11474
  • Add parameter to Except to allow non-uniqueness #102707
  • System.Collections.Generic.List<T> constructor overload for initializing with pre-determined "size" #102662
  • Problem when adding null as "Cookie" in HttpHeaders.Add #102697
  • apphost.exe not created for TestTrimming=true + TestNativeAot=true #102632
  • Queries regarding Custom Profile Guided Optimization (PGO) #13337

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix SIMD12 spills #102736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve Ascii.FromUtf16 and FromHexString #102735
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 9.0.0
  • Fix config binding generator ValueType defaults #102733
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Disable downlevel tests for non-main branches in non-simple WasmBuildTests #102722
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix DispatchProxy throwing TypeLoadException for static virtual members #102718
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Introduce `SwiftSelf<T>` and `SwiftIndirectResult` structs #102717
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Use new package for tracking SDK version number #102713
    area-Infrastructure
  • [LoongArch64] Synchronize with PR#102592. #102711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64

Merged

  • ilasm support for methods with multiple documents #102199
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Http2Connection throws misleading exceptions on ping timeouts #102691
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Revert "Avoid clearing thread local handles for already unloaded loader" #102729
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix invalid operand register in the emitted addition/subtraction code #102074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Update SDK to 9.0 preview 4 #102604
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Disable Loader pri-1 tests that don't compile #102709
    needs-area-label
  • Stop guessing if a type is blittable #102645
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Re-enable CertificateValidationClientServer_EndToEnd_Ok in Windows Native AOT #102517
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Baseline tests in CoreMangLib subtree #102648
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • [release/8.0-staging] Backport 1ES templates #102681
    area-Infrastructure
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • forbid http request with invalid version #102423
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Update the JIT to support rewriting more complex intrinsics as user calls #102702
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Content-Length header not always returned when enumerating HttpContentHeaders #102416
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Socket.DontFragment can't be set on IPv6 DualMode sockets #102700
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Conservative fix for struct stores in optRemoveRedundantZeroInits #102580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adjust repro file message for merged test #102141
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use generic math for floating point formatting #102683
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix LA64 and RISCV64 build errors on Windows #100099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT][hybridglobalization] Run `HybridGlobalization` threading tests #102595
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [NO REVIEW]Activate some H/3 tests and make usage of ConfigureAwait(false) more consistent on H/3 #102699
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Add pseudoinstructions to disassembler #102260
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Align LA64 targetpacks with RV64 #102628
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fold identical method bodies in the compiler #101969
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Optimize "(vec & cns) == zero" on arm64 #102705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support TLS Resume with client certificates on Linux #102656
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix test results publishing for host and illink tests #102635
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for primary constructors in LoggerMessageGenerator #101660
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add JsonPascalCaseNamingPolicy #100017
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Delete test testing a weird delegate implementation detail #102647
    needs-area-label

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc]The string "Configured to use loose manifests when installing new manifests." is not localized in dotnet --info output on Loc OS. #41180
  • dotnet pack does not support multiple architectures when PublishReadyToRun is enabled #41179
  • global.json file SDK version is "9.0.100-preview.5.24269.5" but I dont see that SDK version anywhere #41176

PullRequests

Created

  • Use the VMR commit hash for dotnet --info #41190
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Update to may implicit version #41177
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41159
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Dispose streams created by File.Create #41120
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Adds fingerprinting support for assets #41092
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix getting path to full framework MSBuild #40934
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add SmokeTestsLicenseScanPath prop for LicenseScan Test #41143
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add warning for PreferNativeArm64 #40895
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement dotnet test help option #41142
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41131
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to may implicit version #41164
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `value` parameter considered in scope in `nameof()` in event accessor attribute #73733
  • Debug Assert error for __arglist (not handled in ref safety analysis) #73732
  • Compiler should allow calling a property's setter if it doesn't affect the structure itself #73731

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle nullability differences in duplicate interfaces #73730
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged

Merged

  • Avoid unnecessary array+linq allocs in common case #73727
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Use a common mechanism so Taggers access the main thread at the same time. #67259
    Area-IDE
  • Do not serialize ProjectId.DebugName (in release builds) #73710
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Modify (Large/Source)Text.ParseLineStart to specify an initial capacity for line count #73701
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal optimization #73650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Lower allocations in tagging #73729
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Avoid any sort of work converting from Span to TextSpan #73728
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cache options we compute during refactoring operations (option1) #73725
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All tagger work #73718
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Clean up Razor EA #73040
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Authorization - AuthorizeRouteView NotAuthorized tag not triggered when directly accessing /auth from address bar in the browser #55911
  • OpenIdConnectAuthenticationHandler: message.State is null or empty #55910
  • Cascading App.razor component for all pages and components in Blazor #55909
  • Perf regression: mvc #55908
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, json #55907
  • [9.0-preview.4] Remove default tag with the assembly name from OpenAPI document (#55884 ) #55906
  • gRPC json transcoding: Exclude fields referenced in the path from the body in swagger #55899
  • DistributedCache : ForceReconnect does not work correctly with ConnectionMultiplexerFactory #55898

Closed

  • SignalR TS HttpConnection._resolveUrl fails if URL starts with "ws+unix:" (area-signalr) #51185
  • [Java client] OkHttp 3 has vulnerabilities that are fixed in OkHttp4 #46926
    8.0-preview4
  • Perf regression: plaintext #55855
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, plaintext, plainTextWithFilter #55896
  • net8 Razor Pages Web App with Blazor Component. Component not working from csthml page #55415
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #55885

PullRequests

Created

  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.6.24277.1 #55900
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Log whether the localization resource is found or not #55897
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • [browser] Support separation hybrid globalization JS code to es6 module #55716
    area-blazor, arch-wasm, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Fix AntiforgeryMiddlewareTest for non-US date formats #55779
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview6
  • Enable input number component to support type='range' attribute #55583
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fixed LDAP nested group claims #55707
    community-contribution, area-security
  • QuickGrid: Add EventCallback<TGridItem> for clicking on a row. #55851
    area-blazor, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Windows] Shell Flyout overlaps Title bar #22672
  • Android keystore parameter is relative to the project path not the working directory. #22671
  • Unhandled Exception appearing randomly #22670
  • DatePicker and TimePicker use outdated controls on iOS #22669
  • [Android] ListView item rendering breaks when activity is Finished #22668
  • Use native styling in project template #22667
  • Scrollview doesn't recognize scroll command after any gesture recognizer implemented #22666
  • Views don’t default to native attributes #22665
  • Entry indicator wireframe rendering offset issue after clear button display #22662
    Backlog
  • Unable to scroll Horizontal GridItemsLayout in CollectionView with a mouse wheel #22659
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Tooltip doesn't work #22658

Closed

  • [Windows] .NET MAUI 9.0 Preview 4 throws a "combase.dll: A fail fast exception occurred" upon making a grid visible on Windows #22654
  • [regression/8.0.0] [Android] WindowSoftInputModeAdjust not working anymore #18041
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • SetSoftInputMode does not work #22653
  • ListView Scrolled event is not triggered #22630
    Backlog
  • Issue with Essentials.WebAuthenticator and multiple activities #22017
  • react native is used extensively in microsoft. Why should anyone use maui? #22657

PullRequests

Created

  • [XC] Fix loading non-compiled ResourceDictionary #22664
    area-xaml
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22660
    community ✨

Merged

  • [net9.0] Merge main net9.0 bring arcade #22447
    area-infrastructure
  • Weak Parent #22561
    area-controls-general, t/perf
  • [iOS] Fix ListView Scrolled event not triggering #22661
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-listview
  • Fixed creation of the CustomTabsActivityManager #22018
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • [Windows] Improve performance of `ContentPanel.EnsureBorderPath` #22346
    platform/windows 🪟, legacy-area-perf, community ✨, t/perf
  • Stop Android from pinning native references to system services #22281
    platform/android 🤖, area-essentials, community ✨, Backlog
  • [testing] Try xunit 2.6.6 with 2.8.0 vs runner #22621
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix setting the CurrentItem on CarouselView load #22279
    area-controls-collectionview
  • [CI] Bump xcode 15.3.0 #22611
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • Cross TabBar navigation broken on iOS - Fix #22655
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Add a bunch of button tests #22622
    area-testing, area-controls-button
  • [UI Testing] Add legacy tests (alternative) #22635
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Fix the FontImageSource for Windows Unpackaged #22646
    platform/windows 🪟, area-fonts
  • Add possibility to run UI tests per category (or any filter) #22609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-infrastructure
  • Make sure to redraw the background drawable when the size is updated #22626
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing
  • IllegalArgumentException when changing number of tabbar pages - fix #22589
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Testing] Remove IgnoreIfPlatforms usage on UITests #22526
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Windows] Set `CanDrag` and `AllowDrop` only if needed #22640
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, t/perf
  • [XC] compile OnIdiom #21799
    area-xaml
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [Windows] Remove workaround for label text decorations #22650
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, t/perf
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When the `PropertyDiscoveryConvention` is removed, then also skip call to `ValidatePropertyMapping(model, logger)` in ModelValidator #33825
  • Sensative data exception logging #33823
  • System.InvalidOperationException when reading JSON #33822
  • Issue in documentation #33818
  • Add easy support for user-defined niladic functions #33817
    Backlog

Closed

  • I want to keep the users navigation and roleUsers navigations at the same time not just users navigation #33803
  • Tags go missing when using GroupBy() #33794

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.core from 2.1.7 to 2.1.8 #33824
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Output test logging for query tests only on error #33819

Updated

  • Translate ToString() over enums #33706
  • When creating the "missing column" error message, use the same (case insensitive) column name comparer used in field value retrieval #33749

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NETSDKE2E]With net9 preview 5 SDK isntalled, install wasm-toos/maui failed with error "Workload manifest dependency 'Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.Current' version '9.0.0-preview.5.24273.1' is lower than version '9.0.0-preview.6.24272.2' required by manifest 'microsoft.net.workload.mono.toolchain.current' ..." #19850
